channel.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
channel.description:
[url=http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol]Here is the link to the current WIKI[/url]
We have been working on this revision for years now and we still have not completed the packet documentation or figured out what some of the protocol means. I want to get it as close to finished as possible. I am asking that before we start this (if you're interested in assisting) that we compile a list of missing items, a list of opcodes that are not yet documented, after anyone interested can update the WIKI when we have correctly documented the packet. Same for protocol.
[hr]
If you wish for your name to be added to the contributor list, simply contribute a missing item (doesn't have to be documented) in this format:
• Packets: [ opcode, type, length ]
• Protocol [ data type, byte order, data transformation (A, C, S) ]
[code=Missing Packets]
[/code]
[code=Missing Protocol]
[/code]
• Contributors:

item.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:29, topic:534246”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=653042.msg4387963#msg4387963 date=1386385736]

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_NPCs

yeah.

“Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 33554432 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 262048 bytes) in /home/www-data/htdocs/rswiki/includes/Sanitizer.php on line 537”

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653615.0.html

What about outgoing?

Those ARE outgoing, C2S. Theres no information about S2C.

Also to note, these are applicable for more than 1 revision.
[/quote]

I meant S2C outgoing.

“Theres no information about S2C.”

Well let’s get some.[/quote]

A while back I did a lot of work getting information about lesser-documented Server-to-Client packets: http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol

Read full topic

item.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

That’s not particularly true. There’s nothing hidden in the client that is going to make your server substantially better, that resides in the server technology.

item.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

This is what I have in my client for outgoing packet 35:

outBuffer.putOpcode(35); outBuffer.putLEShort(actionId1 + regionAbsoluteBaseX); outBuffer.putShortA(spellId); outBuffer.putShortA(actionId2 + regionAbsoluteBaseY); outBuffer.putLEShort(actionId3 >> 14 & 0x7fff);

Read full topic

item.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

Can’t find magic on object packet anywhere

int objectX = c.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); // Object x int spellID = c.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); // Spell ID int objectY = c.inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); // object Y int objectID = c.inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); // Object ID

Read full topic

item.title: #317 RuneScape WIKI
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:18, topic:534246”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=653042.msg4376363#msg4376363 date=1382156427]

I’m fairly sure that The Soul has a sticky for this.

He had a sticky about server -> client and client -> server packets but I believe it was unstickyed because it never got updated and we had the wiki. It would be great to get any contributions to the wiki, if you aren’t able to change something that is protected like the front page just shoot me a pm and I will change it for you. As it currently stands the specialpages page of the wiki doesn’t work or has even just been blanked out… sooo I am hoping Moparisthebest can find time to check into it which will help greatly since no one can even access the page.

I know some other people have complained about the wiki not being organized so if you have any ideas again just either pm me or keep posting in this topic or another topic.
[/quote]
Enable image uploading.[/quote]

I don’t have the rights for that, I will have to get Moparisthebest to enable it.

EDIT: I looked at the user rights page and Users have the right to upload images, but I don’t believe it was enabled when the wikia was installed.

Read full topic
